channel.title: Workflows on DaisBase
channel.description: Recent content in Workflows on DaisBase

item.title: Adding Users in Host
item.description: Call each client and ask the specific DX numbers they need to be in. Within each DX in the host f5 → new user Fill in red sections - User type will be Dealer Staff and make sure Dealerlogic User is ticked Once created make sure you give them the 3 DAIS permissions If Cloud Logic see below: – If not Cloud Logic, go to If Cloud Logic - you will need to make sure that they have a gg user for them.

item.title: Cancellation Workflow
item.description: Once Zendesk Ticket is recieved: Paste the following template into the text field and fill in the missing values. Hi [name], I’ve received a cancellation request for [organisation name], to end the following services: [insert product(s) here] Please note, as per our Terms and Conditions, the 30 day notice of cancellation will take effect from the day your request was submitted. Therefore, the cancellation date will be [dd/mm/yy] and you will receive one last invoice for month.
